actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to direct the National Institute of Education to develop curriculum concerning the destruction of the European Jewish community by Nazi Germany prior to and during World War II, for dissemination to elementary and secondary schools.

summary.text: Directs the National Institute of Education to develop curricula concerning the destruction of the European Jewish community by Nazi Germany prior to and during World War II, for dissemination to elementary and secondary schools. Authorizes appropriations of sums necessary to carry out the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to direct the National Institute of Education to develop curriculum concerning the destruction of the European Jewish community by Nazi Germany prior to and during World War II, for dissemination to elementary and secondary schools.
